    Developers

What is HMDA?

Watch the video or read the transcript.

In 2012, there were 19 million HMDA records and 8000 mortgage lenders. It's a view of the mortgage market, an important part of the American economy.

Learn more about HMDA

Learn more Facts & figures

Get the data Find what you want

Filters

Interested in learning about specific mortgage trends in a location, or among a community, or within a certain kind of loans? Filter down your search to find just the dataset you need. You can also download bulk HMDA data by year (it's a large file!)

Filter data

Summary tables

Need more analytical tools? Use your specific search filter (or an annual dataset) to create a summary table that shows cross-sections of your data.

Tabulate data

Develop your own tools Make stuff

  • API documentation
  • API console
  • Qu on GitHub

Under the hood, this site runs on Qu, our new public API for serving CFPB's public data sets. Qu is open source software; we encourage you to contribute to the project on GitHub, or use it to bring CFPB's data into your own applications and visualizations!
